Text: Just got her out of storage.
Where is our sweet little angel? Huh?
You guys need to chill out. (INHALES)
I love it! I love it! I love it! I love it! I love it! (KISSES)
No, no, no, dont. (GROANS) Too late.
This is the same Christmas rock I had when I was a kid.
Its an heirloom thats been in our family for generations.
Tonight when Santa comes by with his presents,
hell see this rock and know that a very special little girl lives here.
MANNY: (SINGING) Oh, Christmas rock, oh, Christmas rock
Youre 30 tons of granite And every...
You know youre singing to a rock, right?
Its a Christmas tradition for the kids.
Every year my dad would bring home the biggest, fattest gazelles he could find
and then wed all rip into their...
And wed play games with the gazelles
and dance with them and not eat them. The end.
Uncle Sid, we need this so that Santa can find us tonight.
(STUTTERS) He could go right past it.
You need something bigger, taller, sparklier.
(SCOFFS) Do you know how ridiculous that sounds?
Theres millions of trees out there, Sid.
How would anyone notice this one?
Hmm. It needs a certain razzle-dazzle on top.
And just like that, a tradition is born.
Seriously, what did you think was gonna...
Yep. That says Sid, all right.
Okay, okay. Lets just keep it together.
It really is about the spirit of Christmas, isnt it?
Youre about to be a spirit of Christmas, Sid!
You know what, Sid, Im the least of your worries.
He is never gonna forgive this.
You just got yourself on Santas...
And if youre not good, then he puts your name on it.
Well, if your names on the Naughty List, you dont get Christmas.
Besides the fact that its my fault. (CHUCKLES)
The Naughty List? Where did you come up with that?
Relax. Sids gullible but hes not that gullible.
He knows this Santa stuff is just for kids.
What? You dont believe in Santa?
If anyone deserves to be on the Naughty List, Dad, its you!
She sure told you, didnt she?
Well, too bad, Im a grown-up.
Grown-ups dont believe in the Naughty List.
Why am I on Santas Naughty List?
My guess, because he doesnt have a loser list.
Well, thanks for trying to cheer me up.
- No time. - Were going to the Pole.
so I can prove to my dad that hes real.
And were gonna get you off that list.
We may be naughty but we still want Christmas.
Peaches, honey, you cant come with us.
This is a very dangerous journey.
The North Pole is a desolate land of ice and snow.
Come on, Uncle Sid, I want us all to have Christmas together.
Its wildly irresponsible and impulsive but lets do it!
- Northward, ho! - CRASH AND EDDIE: Ho ho ho!
(SIGHS) Uh, guys, lets follow the northern lights.
SID: (SINGING) On the ninth day of Christmas
My true love gave to me Nine fleas a-biting
Huh. I think we just marched off the Earth.
Well be safe as long as we all
Eddie? Where are you, Eddie? Oh, wait. Im Eddie.
Okay, everyone, grab hold of your buddy and follow me.
I have an excellent sense of direction.
Ha! Did you see what I just did there?
Check it out, Sauerkraut. I can hover, roll and zing.
My name is, um, uh, Prancer.
You saved our lives and well never forget you.
Are you sure you dont need my help?
Oh, no thank you. Youve done more than enough.
Look, well take it from here. (SCREAMS)
You want an honest answer or a Christmas answer?
Have you seen Peaches? I cant find her anywhere.
And Sid, Crash and Eddie are gone, too!
Last I saw them, they were trying to figure out
how to get off Santas Naughty List.
What Naughty List? I made it up!
Diego, can you pick up Sids scent?
I can but it makes my eyes burn.
So, Prancer, how long will it take us to get to the, uh, North Pole?
Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! You cant walk to the North Pole.
But I can fly you there. No sweat, on Air Prancer.
No, no, no, no. My family raised me
to be good to strangers and theres really no one stranger than you guys.
Weve run into a little turbulence, folks.
Im not too heavy, am I?
No, no. Youre light as a feather.
(GAGS) Do you come equipped with barf bags?
Are you sure this is North?
The geomagnetic whatever, its messing with my sense of direction.
Were completely lost, my little girl is missing and...
Manny, honey, everythings gonna be fine.
Just believe in the magic of Christmas.
- Just try it. - Its not gonna work.
Um, that was just a coincidence, right?
Who cares? Ill take it. Lets go.
EDDIE: We must be getting close.
HEAD MINI SLOTH: Halt!None shall pass. - (ALL GASP)
Oh. Oh, hi, little guy. So, who are you?
We keep intruders out so Santa can do his work without interruption.
(GASPS) I knew he was real! Youve gotta let us see him.
Turn back, I command you. Bye! (GRUNTS)
Oh, yeah? You and what army?
But you gotta let me in. Im on the list!
He must not be disturbed or we wont get presents.
You have been warned. Unleash heck!
Bring it on, you little fleabags!
Youre no match for the power of...
Everybody, grab a leg and pull!
(SINGING) You better watch out You better not cry
Better not pout Im telling you why
Oh, Im making a list And checking it twice
Wait, wait. The reindeer fly up here?
Oh, baby, we were so worried about you. (KISSES)
Just cause theres a fat guy, doesnt make him Santa.
Im not fat! Its this suit, its very poofy.
And hes just as old and decrepit as I imagined.
Two hours to Christmas and everythings ruined!
My toys, my sleigh! All my hard work.
Um, would this be a good time to talk about getting off the Naughty List?
There is now, Manfred. Thanks for the idea.
Wait, wait! How do you know my
Peaches, you were... I mean, I mean, I was...
Theres gonna be a lot of disappointed kids tomorrow morning.
Theres gotta be a way to fix this.
Dad, its impossible! Theres only eight of us.
Wait, us? You mean, as in, us?
You never thought to give the old fat boy a hand, huh?
You taught me to believe. What do you say?
(SINGING) Deck the halls with moss and rock weed
I can fix this, Mr. Santa
Give a sloth a chance Now, cant you?
Too many "la s"are in this song
I have no idea why I just did that.
Thats a toy! And thats a toy!
And this? This is no good for anything.
Sid has got the proper spirit
- Beautiful! - Dont let Sid near it.
We can Do It - lf We hurry
Lend a claw - Lend a paw
Even if youre small and furry
All together we can get it done
A ball of twine? Whos gonna want that?
What do we do with this?
Oh, why dont we put it here.
This shall go down in the annals
Peace and goodwill towards all mammals
- Oh, you shouldnt have. - Just for you.
Things were looking grim and tragic
But we got busy and pulled it off
Now we found some Christmas magic
All because of each and every sloth
"All because of each and every sloth"?
I cant believe it. These presents!
I bet the mini sloths could help you make presents every year! Right, guys?
In fact, it looks like you got enough toys for every child on Earth.
I wish I could, but I dont see how.
(LAUGHS) Santa, Im giving you the biggest Christmas gift of all.
Me! Youre flying Air Prancer tonight.
Oh, thats the spirit, Prancy boy!
Time to put this deer in high gear.
This family doesnt give up that easy.
Come on, Prancer. We have to keep trying.
Youre the only flying reindeer weve got.
Youre right. I cant do this alone.
Wow! Heck of a day, eh, Santa?
Oh. Still on the Naughty List, huh?
SID: Okay, so we traveled about 30 feet so far.
If we keep up this pace, we should make it around the world in what?
Nothings impossible if you pull together.
Dasher, Dancer, Vixen, Comet, Cupid, Donner...
And I thought Prancer was bad!
I thought I was such a hotshot, but sometimes you gotta have a little help.
Thats what this herd has taught me...
See what happens when you believe, Dad?
I gotta say, Im kinda digging the holiday magic.
THE END Subtitles by: English - US - SDH
